content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1! I'm from [user 1 location] and I love to meet new people.
Hi, my name is participant_2! I'm from [user 2 location] and I'm a homebody.
Oh, that's cool! I love to travel. I've been to Bora Bora, which is where my parents live. What's your favorite place you've ever been?
I've never been anywhere! I'm not a fan of flying.
Oh, that's too bad! Flying is my favorite part of traveling. I love the feeling of being up in the air.
I guess it's just not for me.
Well, that's okay. I'm sure you have plenty of other hobbies to keep you busy. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to watch movies and TV shows. I also love to cook and bake.
That's great! I love to cook too. I'm actually in a cooking class right now.
That's awesome! What kind of food do you like to cook?
I like to cook all kinds of food, but I'm especially good at making Italian food.
I love Italian food! What's your favorite Italian dish to cook?
My favorite dish to cook is lasagna. It's so easy to make and it always turns out delicious.
Lasagna is my favorite too! I love the creamy sauce and the cheesy noodles.
Me too! It's the perfect comfort food.
I know, right? It's so good.
Well, it was nice talking to you! I hope we can get together sometime and cook some lasagna together.
That would be great! I'd love to learn how to make it from a pro like you.
Sounds good! I'll let you know when I'm free.
